column5:
refactored CHashedStringList with std::map.
fixed a bug introduced by commit ed7adf9c7196d30e205eaa4a877a78160520b039
Merge branch 'directwrite' of https://github.com/snowie2000/mactype into directwrite

set DelayedInit mark on the start to prevent dead-loop
this comment fixes the issue #583
set DelayedInit mark on the start to prevent dead-loop
Merge branch 'directwrite' of https://github.com/snowie2000/mactype into directwrite

Merge pull request #582 from NDelt/directwrite

Office 2016 -> Office 2016+
Office 2016 -> Office 2016+ to include Office 2019 and potential later versions
Merge branch 'directwrite' of https://github.com/snowie2000/mactype into directwrite

Correctly apply substitution for virtual fonts declared in the registry.
Now they will point to the same target as their real substances.
This commit fixes the issue #550

Merge pull request #571 from wzv5/patch1

some fixes and optimizations.

some fixes and optimizations.

1. Use std::vector instead of array in CAlphaBlend, too many arrays may cause stack overflow.
2. Fix light shadow color not working properly.
3. operator < in myfont miss a '&'.

Merge pull request #559 from wzv5/patch1

fix crash when initialization failed

fix crash when initialization failed

because of early return, some resources will be released incorrectly when unload the dll.

disable magic static to support Windows XP
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/cpp/build/reference/zc-threadsafeinit-thread-safe-local-static-initialization?view=vs-2019
fixed the incorrect behavior of GetTextFaceA/W/AliasW when lpName is null

Implemented `Include` feature
Better compatibility for Windows 8/8.1, fixed issue #522

Unified font id generation.
Improve font identification by concatenate fullname, stylename and familyname together with an extra crc32 of fullname to address cases like FiraCode and FuraCode NF mentioned in issue #513
fallback to safe way to draw texts, until full opentype layout support is done, do no guess.

Added anti-malware info to Known Issues
# Conflicts:
#	README.md

Merge pull request #457 from extratype/master

Substitute fonts in SearchUI (Cortana) and WinStore.App (Microsoft Store)

Merge pull request #449 from extratype/directwrite

Improve DirectWrite Hooking thanks to @extratype
[DirectWrite] Don't hook font APIs when FontSubstitutesDW is empty

disable mactype for DCs with color lower than 24bit.
This walkaround the issue #440.
I can't call it a solution, but most programs today runs under 24bit or 32bit graphic mode, so it should not matter much. And those 16bit programs, they should be able to stay in the degraded cleartype mode safe enough.
[DirectWrite] Hook duplicated methods of ID2D1RenderTarget and ID2D1DeviceContext
[DirectWrite] Hook device from ID2D1DeviceContext (possibly from ID2D1RenderTarget)
[DirectWrite] Update Direct2D APIs to Windows 10 RS4
Added anti-malware info to Known Issues

Merge pull request #434 from vroyibg/patch-1

fix typo in readme.md

Merge pull request #432 from PallHaraldsson/patch-1

Typo

won't exit process when a unsupported vert font is used.
removed horizontal glyph width increment since it doesn't make the expect effect and its side-effect is unknown.

Merge pull request #373 from ip-gpu/PVS_fixes

fixes from PVS-Studio
Fixed a potential null pointer error.

fixes from PVS-Studio

V575 The potential null pointer is passed into 'memset' function. Inspect the first argument. hash_list.cpp 211,217

Merge pull request #368 from felixonmars/patch-1

Fix a typo in README.md

Merge pull request #343 from AT-Aoi/patch-1

Fix typo

Separated DirectWrite param from Direct2d temporarily.
Fixed some logic bugs.

hinting for DirectWrite now follows the global option HintingMode
return true if previous call to MakeD2DParams succeed.

removed unused func
init exe name properly.

optimized some code structure.
dw and d2d now may have separate params for their special behavior
enabled ASLR support

added latest DirectWrite support
added a whole new DirectWrite section for DW only settings
completely remove windows private profile related api to improve performance.
removed some unused/unnecessary codes.

Windows 10 preview compatible.
Fully removed CreateProcess hook from mactype core dll.

add bootstrap to help preparing mactype environment
debug version, do not use!

removed delayhlp
use ldrLoadDll to inject dll from x86 to x64 processes for better compatibility.

Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/snowie2000/mactype
change version info.

calculate position based on Windows API with priority
fixed a unicode plane related problem.

calculate position based on Windows API in prior.
fixed a unicode plane related problem.

disable clipboxfix by default, it causes too many troubles.
one time calculation for dpi based clipboxfix.
delay load individual settings and alpha table.
read profile using internal ini parser.
Delay load easyhook so that no path is required.

mactype no longer add its path to environment any more which will give a performance boost when creating new processes.
This will fix the slow down issue reported by issue #192
stack optimization, this should fix the issue related to #192

rollback last change of firefox fix.
fixed a serious bug that cause app to crash. reported by issue #191
try to solve the bug report by issue #191

get screen dpi when startup
increase clipbox size dynamically based on screen dpi.
New child process hook method is now win10 compatible.

version updated
removed old freetype files
add some code to avoid a vs2015 DllMain bug which will call dllmain with reason_process_detach multiple times.
introduced a way better method to inject dll to x64 process from x86

add missing files
change wow64ext to static lib.

fixed some bugs with PVS
added MinHeight params to simulate DPI aware
added support for hooking x64 child processes spawned from wow64 processes.

fixed chrome crash bug
added a new GammaValueDW param which only valid for DW tweak.
fix the logic bug of clipboxfix param

add eventlogger (not enabled)
add process interactive detection to prevent stucking at boot in some system. (mainly windows 10)

allow you to disable clipboxfix again to get rid of potential side effect of clipbox enlargement.
Removed usage of Getversion/GetVersionEx.
set compile toolset to xp compatible mode.

fixed issue that caused windows7 to stuck at boot when dw tweak is on.
fixed issue that caused edge to lag/crash

Support more recent version of DirectWrite/D2D
Fix a bug that will crash program in certain cases.
version info updated.
fixed an issue that will freeze process in certain cases.

added debugOutput
directwrite tweak improved. Now Google chrome can be tweaked.

fixed a serious bug that cause stack overflow on directwrite/d2d hooks.
font substitution on directwrite/d2d is now implemented.

add directwrite/direct2d tweak support.
better windows version detection.

add proper dealing with ETO_PDY mode
corrected the way to fix the clipbox issue. Credit to silight-jp

Initial release. Some files may missing, please report.
Dependency not included.

Deps: EasyHook, FreeType
